Description_lang: Hardened by the gladiator pits of Stonemaul, Pitfighter Vaandaam is a master of hand to hand combat.
AuraDescription_lang: Hardened by the gladiator pits of Stonemaul, Pitfighter Vaandaam is a master of hand to hand combat.

name_blz.zh_CN: 追随者：角斗士瓦安达姆

description_blz.en_US: Hardened by the gladiator pits of Stonemaul, Pitfighter Vaandaam is a master of hand to hand combat.
description_blz.es_MX: Endurecido por los fosos de gladiadores de Quebrantarrocas, el luchador de foso Vaandaam es un maestro del combate mano a mano.
description_blz.pt_BR: Empedernido pelos fossos de Pedramalho, o Pugilista Maguula é um mestre do combate corpo a corpo.
description_blz.de_DE: Grubenkämpfer Vaandaam ist durch die Gladiatorgruben in den Ruinen der Steinbrecher abgehärtet und ein Meister im Nahkampf.
description_blz.en_GB: Hardened by the gladiator pits of Stonemaul, Pitfighter Vaandaam is a master of hand to hand combat.
description_blz.es_ES: Avezado en los fosos de gladiadores de Quebrantarrocas, el luchador de foso Vaandaam es un maestro del combate cuerpo a cuerpo.
description_blz.fr_FR: Endurci dans les fosses de gladiateurs de Cognepierre, le combattant d’arène Vaandaam est un maître du combat au corps à corps.
description_blz.it_IT: Indurito dalle fosse dei gladiatori dei Mazzapietra, il Combattente delle Fosse Vaandaam è un maestro nel combattimento corpo a corpo.
description_blz.ru_RU: Боец Вандаам, закаленный гладиаторскими боями на аренах Каменного Молота, является мастером рукопашного боя.
description_blz.ko_KR: 돌망치 투기장에서 잔뼈가 투사 밴댐은 맨손 격투의 대가입니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 飽經石槌鬥士之坑的淬鍊，鬥士范達姆是徒手搏擊的大師。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在石槌角斗士竞技场历经千锤百炼，角斗士瓦安达姆俨然已成为一个近身肉搏战的行家里手。
